FLAVOUR_0_MEMBER_INTRO.message: Puede adquirir combustible y disponer de {radioactives} aquí.

FLAVOUR_0_NONMEMBER_INTRO.message: {clubname} is an independent organisation dedicated to providing discounted starship fuel to its members. Branches can be found throughout the galaxy. Benefits of membership include:

LIST_BENEFITS_FUEL_INTRO.message: Our own stocks of fuel, independent of the general market

LIST_BENEFITS_JOIN.message: Join now! Annual membership costs only {membership_fee}

WE_WILL_ONLY_DISPOSE_OF.message: Solo dispensaremos una cantidad de {radioactives} equivalente a las toneladas de {military_fuel} adquiridas.

WHAT_CONDITIONS_APPLY.message: ¿Cuáles son las condiciones aplicables en la disponibilidad de {radioactives}?

YOU_ARE_NOW_A_MEMBER.message: Ahora es miembro. Su afiliación expira en {expiry_date}.
